attributes.action: strip Sir Alex Ferguson of his knighthood and reward it to Bruce Forsyth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that Alex Ferguson is setting a poor example to the rest of the country with his constant moaning and permanent red face.  A knighthood should be given to only those who have truly earned it.  If it wasn't for Bruce Forsyth half the country wouldn't be able to dance whereas Fergie has done nothing apart from win a few games of football.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
